content: Lots of things are coming in Roc changing the language fundamentaly in 0.1. Which of the planned features will change how platforms are developed? It is my understanding that PI was a major change. However the Rust and Zig templates has been updated and so has CLI and webbserver platforms. Basically what im asking is what is going to be most stable leading up to 0.1. My platform code or my Roc code?
Roc code definitely has a lot of changes slotted for 0.1
Platform code still has a lot of changes to come, but they are lower priority. More likely for 0.2.
That said, if a motivated individual adds these features sooner they will be part of 0.1
So expect changes mostly to roc code, but don't be surprised by changes to platforms.
